body: At 5th level, a paladin with this oath is more flexible with her mercies than other paladins. At the start of each day, a paladin with this oath can select her mercies anew from the list of available mercies. This ability replaces divine bond.
name: Charitable Mercy
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Paladin/Paladin Archetypes/Oathbound Paladin/Oaths/Oath of Charity/Charitable Mercy
